extendedInfo.description: Baby Flash Cards is now on Android - Google Play! 11 Categories include: Food items, Animals, Alphabet, Transportation, Numbers, Colors & Shapes, Clothing, Household items, Body Parts, Outdoor items, Music Instruments/Arts & Learning. â 12 Categories - All in 1 App! â Over 450 words! â FREE! â Kids tested - they love it! Parents tested - they love it! â Building vocabulary has never been so much fun â Large words and letters â Large icons and buttons â Professional voiceovers recorded in production studio â High quality images â Real sounds where applicable â Question mode for parent-child interaction â Great memory building exercise Building strong English vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. eFlash Educational Baby Flash Cards in English features over 450 high quality images with text and voiceovers. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voiceovers off during parent-child learning session and turn voiceovers on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach eachother!

reviews.title: A must have app on kids tablet
reviews.comment: I just cant praise this enough have been using with kids last 2 years & this app has been constantly updated with more & more features & content to keep kids playing with it. Once kids learn enough you can switch to question mode where the kids are asked to choose from 4 flash cards, nice concept of teaching kids. The latest version is quite big in size but lets you move the app to external sd card. There are buttons to navigate or you can use swipe mode (settings) to manually change the image, kids find it easy using the finger.
reviews.author: Rinku Pujari

reviews.comment: LOVE this app \342\231\245 so much for baby to learn great bold clear pictures.  LOVE!
reviews.author: ThePhairfamily

reviews.title: Recommended for kids
reviews.comment: I used this app on teaching the basics to my daughter. She\'s only 1 year and 8 months old but can determine these objects from this e flashcards. However, the developers need some fix in the shapes category. Circle here looks like oval and Oval looks like circle. There\'s also some missing colors. More power and thanks for this very useful app.
reviews.author: Fely Ambrocio

reviews.title: Toddler advertising?!?!?!
reviews.comment: This could have been a great program, totally rendered unusable, unless you are okay with constant adverts in the baby\'s field of vision while their minds are absorbing information. Dispicable behavior, even by advertisers standards. Shame on this program, it\'s developers AND their families for generations to come.
reviews.author: Jamison Challeen

reviews.title: Nice app but some issue with soumd
reviews.comment: Nice app. But facing some issue with sound when item\342\200\231s name is spoken. Please help .
reviews.author: Dhara Shah

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is amazing my 2 year old loves it. It has lots of flashcards and is very interactive a great game for little ones.
reviews.author: Benjamin Maxwell

reviews.title: so far i like it
reviews.comment: I just downloaded and looked through all the categories. This is the app I\'ve been searching for!! I love the swipe mode, easy for my toddler who is already used to swiping on phones/tablets. I like that it is real pictures, not cartoonish images. The voice/ sound is good and appropriate for toddlers. (Some apps I\'ve tried have had creepy men\'s voices or strange music.) I also like that every category is in alphabetical order so that the child is picking up their ABC\'s in all categories, not just the ABC category.  Some reviewers complained about the ads, but it is just a small bar across the bottom of thescreen. I\'m not bothered by this. I suppose if the ads really are bothersome, you could just pay a couple bucks for the ad-free version. This app would be worth the money if the ads bothered you that much. My criticisms are minor: the flute flashcard actually shows a picture of a recorder, and a few things are not toddler appropriate (take candy out of the food category because I don\'t want my 2yo thinking it is legitimate food, and why does a toddler need to know about frying pans or blenders, etc.) Overall I\'m impressed with this and am excited to see my child learn from it.
reviews.author: Erin Reed

reviews.title: Best app ever!
reviews.comment: I have had this app for over a year and my toddler loves it. I love it as well because they have learned so much. The question option is wonderful as they get older. If you have children in your life I highly recommend you download this, its free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overdone
reviews.comment: The format is great. It allows the child to hear the audio, see the visual and repeat afterwards. However, there are flash cards within this app that do not pertain to toddlers or babies such as \"frying pans\", \"coffee,\" and \"blenders\". This app needs to be simplified to things that only pertain to babies and toddlers.
reviews.author: Shawn Eskridge

reviews.title: Omar Faruk
reviews.comment: Nice app. My 2 years old baby likes it.
reviews.author: Omar Faruk

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Very good app for children. Got a variety of flash cards.
reviews.author: Anuradha Iyer

reviews.title: Excellent app, just wonder if ...
reviews.comment: This app is very useful for teaching toddlers about the very basics of  afphabet and initial English words by showing real pictures and English pronunciation. I use it with my child and she really loves it. I just wonder if in the Android app version you could change the picture of \"Queen\" in the \"Q\"  letter, because the one  is showing now is a drawing. If a real \"Queen\" picture is there then this app would be ultimately completed.
reviews.author: Gustavo Atoche

reviews.title: Need updating asap
reviews.comment: The version for iPads is much better.... This version needs updating!!!!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice app covers all basics for babies However I think the letters should be bigger than the pictures.....

reviews.comment: Could you please check the app using restricted profile is not working. Force closed. Using normal account is ok

reviews.title: Good for the most part
reviews.comment: Pretty good app, lots of variety. Very overpronounced, would be nice if the words were spoken normally. Some of the words are not used in the us - bangles?? But still a nice app to keep child occupied for a few minutes.

reviews.comment: Very useful
